forum.content:
來自挪威的驚艷!

可作音響測試檔......

建議戴上優質耳機，靜靜聆聽。

Artist: Two Steps From Hell

Composer: Thomas J. Bergersen

Album: Sun (2014)

Track list:
01. 00:00 Before Time 
02. 02:20 Creation Of Earth
03. 08:02 Sun
04. 11:57 Cry
05. 15:58 Our Destiny 
06. 19:53 New Life
07. 24:30 Final Frontier
08. 29:13 Starchild
09. 32:34 Colors Of Love
10. 39:06 Cassandra
11. 42:15 Always Mine
12. 45:31 Dragonland
13. 50:33 Fearless
14. 54:22 Empire Of Angels
15. 59:34 Two Hearts
16. 63:43 In Paradisum
